document_data.name: Battle Hounds
document_data.mainbody: The '''Battle Hounds''' was a mercenary company led by [[Rathgar Malynd]], that operated out of [[Tarmalune]], one of the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]] as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Background: The Battle Hounds provided guards for shops, homes, and warehouses as well as personal security to all paying customers.
